answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.The chest pain may not be related to the pericardial fat pad. It is of little or no significance. It does not affect your heart function directly, but it may be an indicator to have your lipid profile done and to reduce coronary risk factors, such as hypertension, diabetes, smoking and obesity. Please discuss this with your doctor am sure he will provide further assistance.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
